meta_description: When you think of alcohol in Poland, vodka is probably the first thing that comes to mind. But there are many more treasures hidden in the Polish regions – from 150-proof moonshine to light ciders and beers.
title: 8 Must-Try Regional Alcoholic Drinks from Poland
content: When you think of alcohol in Poland, vodka is probably the first thing that comes to mind. But there are many more treasures hidden in the Polish regions – from ‘Polish whiskey’ to ‘Golden Water’, from 150-proof moonshine to light ciders and beers.
